summary: Adds 5 custom Absorb Health spells to the game (Novice-Master), that function as instant ranged touch attacks, and apply a 4 sec life-leeching DOT to targets.  Also increases Destruction skill with usage.
descriptionHtml:
Adds 5 custom Absorb Health spells to the game (Novice-Master), that function as instant ranged touch attacks, and apply a 4 sec life-leeching DOT to targets.  Also increases Destruction skill with usage.

This is part of what is going to be a larger \"Improved Necro\" pack I\'m planning.  Which will eventually include: actual undead summoning spells, poison and curse spells, and (hopefully) a custom skill tree that incorporates them all.
Spells can be purchased from Farengar in Dragons Reach.

This is a WIP, I have finals all next week, so I won\'t have time to work any more on it until after the Holidays most likely.  So I figured I would at least throw this version up.

A note on balance:  I\'ve only ever played the game on Expert/Master, so that is what the mod is \"balanced\" around.  Also I didn\'t take excessive fortify destruction enchants into consideration.  For the same reason that I don\'t balance around the games easy settings, I don\'t have any interest in releasing a separate version for people who like to run around casting Expert level spells for 0 magica.
author: Lownin
